favourite.article: "From the moment I first met Thee, How my heart was filled with joy" Such a sweet love. (:
I remember the Lord who first love us, it's very refreshing and joyful...Lord Jesus I LOVE YOU, I consecrate my whole being to You.

I have a deep experience with this hymn. It helps me to be touched again in the spirit with the Lord. During my wedding ceremony, I did say "Lord! I love You and my sweet Diana, I will love You and thank You..."

Truly when you meet the Lord Jesus Christ as Saviour, you fall in love with Him. Since God's love is in you, it causes you to love even the unlovely. I thank God I have the love of God in my heart. Mahalo!

I've known this song in mandarin many many years ago. Now it has been translated into English. May we all in the Lord's recovery love the Lord even more through this song which brings us memories of how we first met the Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
Amen! this song refreshes me everyday..a joyful sound deep in my heart...FTTM CHURCH IN QUEZON CITY PHILIPPINES-DJ MANLUSOC
Oh the love of the Lord towards us is really unconditional! From the first time I knew Him, He departs from me no more. He continually gives me so much joy and I am rejoicing in Him all throughout.
